message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds of inflation. This offer gives us a good starting point.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation is on my side
Bob, let's be realistic.  Inflation is eating into my gains each round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to settle this.
Inflation is indeed eating into your gains, but it's not affecting mine. I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the circumstances
Bob, this is it. Take it or leave it.  Another round, and inflation will erode even this offer for me. You're getting the better end of this deal - don't be greedy.
